subject: Tennis
Monte Carlo Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Djokovic strolled into the third round with a 6-1, 6-4 victory over the qualifier Albert Ramos-Vinolas, a match that sometimes resembled a practice session.
snippet: Djokovic strolled into the third round with a 6-1, 6-4 victory over the qualifier Albert Ramos-Vinolas, a match that sometimes resembled a practice session.
